author: jm
msg: bug 3759: plugins loaded from the site config path were not getting their parse_config() methods called; fix by invalidating certain method caches when a new plugin is registered.  also, INHIBIT_CALLBACKS as a return type wasn't working, because it forces plugins to only support numeric return types. not good.  removed; implementors should use the alternative $self->inhibit_further_callbacks() API.  also removed a redundant sort() call
